## Tutorial on Function Analysis
The database [FAPROTAX](https://pages.uoregon.edu/slouca/LoucaLab/archive/FAPROTAX/lib/php/index.php) is used to predict the function of microbiota.

***

### Step 1
##### 1. Please upload the metadata file (.tsv) and the taxonomic table file (.qza).
##### 2. After uploading, click on the button **"Start!"** to conduct the analysis.

<img src="/home/imuser/text_files/p5_1.png" width="100%" />

<img src="/home/imuser/text_files/p5_2.png" width="100%" />

***

### Step 2
##### After finishing with FAPROTAX, we provide a table and a barplot to interpret the results.
* **Summary:** This shows essential information regarding the function prediction.
* **Function table:** The shows that reads of the function types in every sample.
  + **Download the function table:** Click on the button **"Download the function table"** to download the table.

<img src="/home/imuser/text_files/p5_3.png" width="100%" />

* **Function barplot:** The horizontal bars indicate reads of each function and the bars are grouped based on the metadata. 
  + **Choose the group:** Select a group and the bars will be grouped based on the metadata accordingly.
  + **Download the function barplot:** Click on the button **"Download the function barplot"** to download the barplot.

<img src="/home/imuser/text_files/p5_4.png" width="100%" />
